mapper.select: select a.DEPART_NM, b.EMP_NM, B.EMAIL, c.POSI_NM from DEPARTMENT a, EMPLOYEE b, POSITION c where b.DEPART_ID = a.DEPART_ID and b.POSI_ID = c.POSI_ID and b.DEPART_ID = #{DEPART_ID} order by c.POSI_ID
select a.depart_nm, b.emp_nm, b.email, c.posi_nm from department a, employee b, position c where b.depart_ID = a.DEPART_ID and b.POSI_ID = c.POSI_ID and b.emp_nm like '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
select a.depart_nm, b.emp_nm, b.email, c.posi_nm from department a, employee b, position c where b.depart_ID = a.DEPART_ID and b.POSI_ID = c.POSI_ID and a.depart_nm like '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
